name: Slow is fast
description:
This is my submission to this weekend's mini Jame Gam.

The theme was Out of Time, so I made a top-down shooter where you must kill enemies, explore levels, and keep an eye on your time which acts as a health pool.

A special item was to be included in the games, a key. So I sprinkled them around the levels, you can pick them up to buy new weapons, or more time.

The game's pretty imbalanced unfortunately, but I had some fun making it.

P.S. Pay no mind to the awful pixel art made by me haha

Thanks for reading ! Have fun and let me know what you think :)
